attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its time now for the people of this country to take back the power that has been taken by the MPs, we did not give them the power, those people created it themselves. We did not elect Gordon Brown, he was pushed on us by the last corrupt Premier.Its time we as a nation  stood for what this country was once about Freedom.not corruption STAND DOWN NOW WE HAS A NATION DEMAND IT.GIVE US THE RIGHT TO GET RID OF THE LEACHES THAT HAS BROUGHT THIS COUNTRY TO ITS KNEES

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
